chargeHist.descr: Deliver Methamphetamine within 1000 feet of park(<=3g)
Deliver Heroin within 1000 feet of park (<3g)

result.execSummary:
The defendant Chris E. BRYAN was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Deliver Methamphetamine(<=3g), a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1)(e)1.
  • Deliver Heroin (<3g), a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1)(d)1.

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant demands a preliminary hearing and waives the statutory time period within which a preliminary hearing must be held.   Preliminary hearing is set for 12-02-15 at 1:30 p.m.   
Minutes.
Adam Snavely, through Public Defender.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crimes of deliver schedule I, II or II non-narcotics on or near a park, deliver imitation controlled substance and 2 counts deliver Methamphetamine within 1000 feet of park.  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 11-09-15 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $10,000.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that he report daily to Manitowoc County Sheriff's Department by 2:00 p.m.  Bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.
Minutes.
Warrant served.
RE:  Deliver Suboxone, on 05-28-15.
